entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
